result.eng: I almost thought I wouldn't be paid.
result.ga: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí mé
result.orig: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí mé
result.html: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí méI almost thought I wouldn't be paid.
result.ponchtml: Is beag a ċeap mé go n-íocfaí méI almost thought I wouldn't be paid.

result.ga: Tá a chuid gruaige beagnach imithe
result.orig: Tá a chuid gruaige beagnach imithe
result.html: Tá a chuid gruaige beagnach imitheHis hair is almost gone.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ċuid gruaige beagnaċ imiṫeHis hair is almost gone.

result.html: Tá mé beagnach críochnaitheI am almost finished.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé beagnaċ críoċnaiṫeI am almost finished.

result.eng: It's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.
result.ga: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoil
result.orig: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoil
result.html: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog caithfidh mé dul ar scoilIt's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé beagnaċ a naoi a ċlog caiṫfiḋ mé dul ar scoilIt's almost nine o'clock, I have to go to school.

result.eng: He is almost tree years old.
result.ga: Tá sé chóir a bheith trí bliana d'aois
result.orig: Tá sé chóir a bheith trí bliana d'aois
result.html: Tá sé chóir a bheith trí bliana d'aoisHe is almost tree years old.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ċóir a ḃeiṫ trí bliana d'aoisHe is almost tree years old.

result.eng: It is almost certain that we will be late.
result.ga: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainn
result.orig: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainn
result.html: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainnIt is almost certain that we will be late.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeiḋ moill orainnIt is almost certain that we will be late.

result.html: Tá tú nach mór annYou're almost there.
result.ponchtml: Tá tú naċ mór annYou're almost there.

result.ga: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog
result.orig: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlog
result.html: Tá sé beagnach a naoi a chlogIt's almost nine o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé beagnaċ a naoi a ċlogIt's almost nine o'clock.

result.eng: He almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
result.ga: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhair
result.orig: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhair
result.html: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhairHe almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃeag nár ṫit sé as a ẛeasaṁ leis an raḋarc a ḃí os a ċoṁairHe almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
